Text: Ohhhh man wth is GCB??? I dont think tv even knows,lol. Am i the only one who has like 500 movies on the pc and has a big problem finding torrents cuss its shortened to GCB or what ever?Im like all stoned and looking at a show thats been in my to watch list and i have no idea wth it is cuss it says something like GCB    Ok ty i feel better now.
The series then was renamed to "Good Christian Belles" which appeared in several promos before the final renaming to the initialism "GCB". Several ABC affiliates in Texas
